list_title: batch 1 PMID24824899 Classification of Self-Driven Mental Tasks from Whole-Brain Activity Patterns

metadata.title: Classification of self-driven mental tasks from whole-brain activity patterns.

text: There were 50 participants in this study. We smoothed functional images using a kernel of 5 mm FWHM. We used a cluster-defining threshold of 20 voxels.

list_title: batch 1 PMID25506057 Different Resting-State Functional Connectivity Alterations in Smokers and Nonsmokers with Internet Gaming Addiction

metadata.title: Different resting-state functional connectivity alterations in smokers and nonsmokers with Internet gaming addiction.

text: We recruited 10 healthy volunteers and 15 schizophrenic patients. We then applied spatial smoothing (6 mm FWHM). Results images were thresholded at p<0.5, corrected for multiple comparisons using FWER.

list_title: batch 1 PMID23209643 Increased Neural Habituation in the Amygdala and Orbitofrontal Cortex in Social Anxiety Disorder Revealed by fMRI

metadata.title: Increased neural habituation in the amygdala and orbitofrontal cortex in social anxiety disorder revealed by FMRI.

text: Four hundred individuals volunteered for the study. Five were excluded for excess head movement, leaving a final sample of 395. We applied motion regression, high-pass filtering, and spatial smoothing with a FWHM of 2 mm. Results with a minimum volume of 5 mm3 are reported in Table 2.
